groups.name: Fidget Friends
groups.description: A supportive community for individuals who enjoy fidgeting as a way to focus and relax. Members share tips, products, and personal experiences related to fidgeting.

groups.name: Slider Innovators
groups.description: Dedicated to the creation and customization of slider fidget toys. Share designs, modifications, and best practices for smooth operation.

groups.name: 3D Spinner Makers
groups.description: Focused on designing and 3D printing spinner fidgets. Collaborate on new models and share printing tips.

groups.name: Metal Bead Fidgets
groups.description: Explore the intersection of metal craftsmanship and bead fidget toys. Share creations and techniques for durable, stylish fidgets.

groups.name: Custom 3D Fidgets
groups.description: A hub for enthusiasts who design and 3D print a variety of fidget toys. Share your projects, get feedback, and collaborate on new ideas.

groups.name: Spinner Community
groups.description: Join fellow spinner lovers to discuss the latest spinner trends, designs, and techniques for maximizing relaxation and focus.
